name: TransConn
description:
Game made for GMTK 2021.

In this game you can't even be sure in who you are: a human or a machine. All you need is to follow a weird spirit from your amulet. You have to handle a connection with it: when it gets close to you, press right mouse button to keep connection. Otherwise it breaks and you lose. 

For some reason you also have a gun instead of your left hand. To use it press left mouse button. It will help you in elimination of unknown mechanisms. Their only purpose is to break your connection.

Made by:

TET (Mikhail) — art, sound, models, animations

baldron (Andrey) — code, animations

Sources:

font — modeseven by Andrew Bulhak

Engine — Godot
